contentBlocks.title: General Spa Heater Requirements
paragraphs: Spa heaters must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Spa heaters must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa heaters must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa heaters must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Spa heaters must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Spa heaters must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa heaters must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa heaters must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Spa heaters must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa heaters must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa heaters must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa heaters must be installed by a qualified person.
